title: Any ideas?
content:
sorry for the quality - photo off the tv:  
 [http://www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021224758/http:/www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont3.jpg "http://www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont3.jpg")
author: mart

comments.content:
Aha! Also, many thanks for the tidbit of the aka name Oscar. It was originally an Aldo Novarese design! I just knew it was good!  
I saw it used as the caption font on the Fox News late night comedy chat show "Red Eye", The shots I took off the tv screen are here:  
 [http://www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021224758/http:/www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont1.jpg "http://www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont1.jpg")  
 [http://www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021224758/http:/www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont2.jpg "http://www.dazeofourlives.com/CaptionFont2.jpg")

No shots of the lower case, but when I saw that used in the tv show's captions it only served to make me more interested to find out what font it was.

Again - thank you Mark!
